description_0: A medium-close-up view of a yellow Porsche Cayenne parking in front of a large concrete planter that has blooming flowers of red, purple, and deep violet. The Porsche has a roof rack, on which two silver bars extend horizontally across the roof. The sun is reflecting brightly on the hood of the car near the left headlight, and the shadow of the vehicle is falling mostly under the vehicle, extending towards the left. Behind and to the right, a black SUV-style vehicle is parked, and the reflection of the yellow car is visible on the side. In the center of the background, a tree with a large green, leafy canopy is casting shade over two vehicles parked behind the Porsche.
description_1: A medium shot view of the slight side angle of a black Fiat 500 Abrath parked in a parking lot. A reflection of the sun is in the top left portion of the windshield and hood of the Fiat car. A shadow of the fiat car is cast on the ground to the right and front of the car. A yellow parking block sits on the black pavement in front of the Fiat. A reflection of a building is seen in the silver cars' passenger door behind the black Fiat. A road, white building, trees and blue sky is seen in the background behind the cars.
